detectors.description:
ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreFinance12.sol#46-52) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool)(balances[msg.sender] >= _amount && _amount > 0 && balances[_to] + _amount > balances[_to]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreFinance12.sol#47)
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreFinance12.sol#48)
	- balances[_to] += _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreFinance12.sol#49)

detectors.description:
ERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreFinance12.sol#54-61) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool)(balances[_from] >= _amount && allowed[_from][msg.sender] >= _amount && _amount > 0 && balances[_to] + _amount > balances[_to]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreFinance12.sol#55)
	- balances[_from] -= _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreFinance12.sol#56)
	- allowed[_from][msg.sender] -= _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreFinance12.sol#57)
	- balances[_to] += _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CoreFinance12.sol#58)
